mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_care ( ai_content, ai_input_tokens, ai_output_tokens, ai_total_tokens, ai_month, beneficiary_id, ai_last_log_id, ai_logs_count, ai_last_service_date ) VALUES ( #{aiContent}, #{aiInputTokens}, #{aiOutputTokens}, #{aiTotalTokens}, #{aiMonth}, #{beneficiaryId}, #{aiLastLogId}, #{aiLogsCount}, #{aiLastServiceDate} )
